data.eml:eml: A New Mayfly Species of Epeorus (Caucasiron) from Southwestern China (Ephemeroptera: Heptageniidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Chen, Ping, Wang, Yu-Yu, Zhou, Chang-Fa (2010): A New Mayfly Species of Epeorus (Caucasiron) from Southwestern China (Ephemeroptera: Heptageniidae). Zootaxa 2527: 61-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.196454
